attributes.action: To add 10 days extra of mental health days on top of public holidays
attributes.background: This law is for everyone, MP’s, nurses, bartenders, everyone. I believe that success is achievable with a healthy frame of mind. Giving people this time will make them feel more entitled to carry on with work, this will also help those suffering with mental health issues.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure exactly what you mean by mental health days. In particular, we're not sure whether you want 10 additional public holidays or for employed people to be entitled to 10 additional days off in addition to their annual holiday entitlement.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to provide your full name or initial plus surname.
